column4: how do I make it so nautilus only makes a new window when I want it to?
currently it makes a new window when I hit backspace, and on every step of looking at smb shares
I want it to not make new windows all the time
in the Edit menu of your nautilus window
there isn't a setting for it in there
it seems if you tick that open in browser thing it opens it in the file browser
which has a 'tree' menu on the left
might make life easier, I dont know
* Plays MIDI files without any external MIDI instruments at all
its in the 'recommended' part...select timidity and right click...check 'recommended'
